text: Godfrey Alan "Goff" Letts (18 January 1928 â€“ 10 March 2023) was an Australian politician. He was the Majority Leader of the Northern Territory from 1974 to 1977.Powell, A. (1988) Far Country: A Short History of the Northern Territory, Melbourne University Press, Carlton. . ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Chief Ministers of the Northern Territory Category:Order of Australia Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:Politicians from Victoria (Australia) Category:Independent politicians in Australia
